name: Gryffindor
startIntroPart1: Where dwell the brave at heart, their daring, nerve and chivalry set Gryffindors apart.
startIntroPart2: The Gryffindor House is known for its bravery, courage, and valiance in the face of danger. Do you have what it takes to lead the most noble of all the Houses?
declaringWar: You have insulted my honour. Prepare for war.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Hello. I give you my warm greetings.
tradeRequest: The house of Gryffindor offers you this fair deal.
uniques: All newly-trained [Military] units [in your cities] receive the [Morale] promotion
No damage penalty for wounded units

name: Slytherin
startIntroPart1: There is no good or evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it!
startIntroPart2: While it may be known for Dark wizards, that's not all Slytherin has to offer. It's a house of cunning, ambition, and refusing to accept what is offered. Do you think you can lead the house of schemers?
declaringWar: The world will be more beautiful without you. Prepare for war.
attacked: Fool! You will soon regret dearly! I swear it!
defeated: You have won, congratulations. My service is now in your possession.
tradeRequest: Come forth, let us make a deal.
uniques: [100] Gold <upon declaring war with a major Civilization>
